name: Hill St
description: A tree-lined stretch of Hill Street, offering a brief respite from the sun. You are on Hill St. The street here is lined with mature trees, their branches forming a leafy canopy that provides ample shade, a small mercy in the relentless march of time. Hill St continues its journey to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
